Class Ranker

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.group6.Ranker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Ranker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Calculates the number of routes for each airport

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable obs,
                   java.lang.Object obj)
        Triggers an update of the route counts. Tries to only do the minimum to keep the counts up to date.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        obs - the observable object
        obj - an argument passed to the notifyObservers method

      • countRoutes

        private void countRoutes()
        Resets the number of routes for each airport and counts all the routes in the active route list.

      • countRoute

        private void countRoute(Route route)
        Counts the given route if valid.
        Parameters:
        route - individual route to count

      • setNumberOfRoutes

        private void setNumberOfRoutes()
        Sets the number of routes for each airport in the active list. Temporarily removes this class as an observer of the list while doing so as to not cause an update here.

      • setNumberOfRoutes

        private void setNumberOfRoutes(Route route)
        Sets the number of routes only for the terminals of the given route.
        Parameters:
        route - the route who's terminals need updating.
